All Classes

  • Class Description
    Account
    Accounts are used for authentication One Account gets initialized on Login
    AccountDAO
    Implements the Interface DAOImp.
    AES
    Implements the Interface EncryptionMethod.
    AllCaregiverController
    The AllCaregiverController contains the entire logic of the caregiver view.
    AllPatientController
    The AllPatientController contains the entire logic of the patient view.
    AllTreatmentController
    The AllTreatmentController contains the entire logic of the patient view.
    Caregiver
    Caregiver Objects contain all business information for caregivers of the nursing home
    CaregiverDAO
    Implements the Interface DAOImp.
    ConnectionBuilder
    Singleton Class for making a SQL connection
    DAO<T>  
    DAOFactory
    Singleton Object that handles access to DAO objects from all classes
    DAOimp<T>
    Implements methods of DAO that wont change on extending DAOImp
    DateConverter
    Class to Convert Dates to String and vice versa
    DeleteManager
    Class for deleting old locked data based in DSGVO standards
    EncryptedPassword
    Encrypted Password Object that is used by Account.
    EncryptionMethod
    extend this class to make a new way of encrypting that is compatible to NHPLUS
    ExportManager
    Class for exporting to CSV
    LoginController
    The LoginController contains the entire logic of the login view.
    Main
    Main class
    MainWindowController
    The MainWindowsController contains the entire logic of the main window view.
    NewTreatmentController
    The NewTreatmentController contains the entire logic of the new treatment view.
    Patient
    Patients live in a NURSING home and are treated by nurses.
    PatientDAO
    Implements the Interface DAOImp.
    Person
    Should be implemented by Objects representing real people
    Role
    Role object for easier role checking than with string
    State
    Singleton class for global data
    Treatment
    Treatments are linked to a patient and a caregiver
    TreatmentController
    The TreatmentController contains the entire logic of the edit treatment view.
    TreatmentDAO
    Implements the Interface DAOImp.
